level.text: This chapter shall apply through September 30, 2014.
Beginning on October 1, 2014, this chapter shall apply upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-168 rewrote the section.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 7015 of Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-383, June 19, 2012, 59 DCR 7764).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 7015 of Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-413, July 25, 2012, 59 DCR 9290).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-94
level.text: For history of Law 19-94, see notes under § 31-3171.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-168
level.text: Law 19-168, the "Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Act of 2012," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-743. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 15, 2012, and June 5, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 22, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-385 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-168 became effective on September 20, 2012.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 7016 of D.C. Law 19-168 provided that § 7015 of the act shall apply as of June 19, 2012.
